document.author: JulSa_
document.text: Voici la mise à jour du Playstation Store du 31 Aout 2011. On remarque quelques nouveaux jeux PS3 , comme 4 Elements HD et TV Superstars , mais aussi la démo de Bodycount . PlayStation Store (via PS3, PSP et Media Go) PSP Power Sale (disponible jusqu’au 7 Septembre) Pour plus de détails sur les jeux disponibles pour le PSP Power Sale voir ce post sur le Blog . Réduction de prix Blue Toad Murder Files: Episode One est désormais définitivement gratuit Les épisodes de 2 à 6 sont également disponibles. Essai et déblocage (PS3) The Baconing (12.99€) Rating: PEGI 12 20% de reductions pour les abonnés PlayStation Plus Jeux complets (PS3) 4 Elements HD (7.99€) Rating: PEGI 3 Elevator Action Deluxe (9.99€) Rating: PEGI 12 TV Superstars (19.99€) Rating: PEGI 7 minis (PS3 & PSP ) Left to Die in Zombhai (2.99€) Rating: PEGI 16 Snowy: The Bear’s Adventures (8.99€) Rating: PEGI 3 BETA (PS3) Resistance 3 Multiplayer Beta Rating: PEGI 18 Démo (PS3) Bodycount Demo Rating: PEGI 18 Ajouts de jeux et contenus (PS3) YooStar 2 I work only 16 hours a day (1.75€) When the goin’ gets tough (1.75€) Mrs Hangley’s a lot better than you (1.75€) The promise of a woman (1.75€) Rating: PEGI 12 Disponibilité : non disponible en Belgique. LittleBigPlanet 2 Toy Story 3 Costume Kit (5.99€) Mr Pricklepants Costume (1.99€) Lots-o-Huggin’ Bear Costume (1.99€) Trixie Costume (1.99€) Dolly Costume (1.99€) Rating: PEGI 7 Dynasty Warriors Gundam 3 – Cherudim Gundam Pack (3.99€) Rating: PEGI 12 Championship Jockey: G1 Jockey and Gallop Racer – Variety Pack (2.49€) Rating: PEGI 3 Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine – Elite Pass (7.99€) Rating: PEGI 18 Magic: The Gathering – Duels of the Planeswalkers 2012 – ‘Ancient Depths’ Full Deck (0.99€) Rating: PEGI 7 Homefront – The Rock Map Pack (3.99€) Rating: PEGI 18 Street Fighter III: Third Strike Online Edition – Street Fighter III Dipswitch Pages (0.99€) Rating: PEGI 12 Rock Band Network Bed Intruder Song (Feat. Kelly Dodson) by Antoine Dodson & The Gregory Brothers (1.49€) Betus Blues (Retro Remix) by db Soundworks (0.79€) Caves by Chiodos (1.49€) Pray For Plagues by Bring me the Horizon (1.49€) Turning Sheep Into Goats/Systematomatic by Rishloo (0.79€) Rating: PEGI 12 Disponibilité : non disponible au Luxembourg Rock Band 3 I’m With the Chili Peppers Pack (9.99€) (contient les pistes suivantes, également disponibles séparément) By The Way (1.49€) Californication (1.49€) Look Around (1.49€) Monarchy Of Roses (1.49€) Otherside (1.49€) Parallel Universe (1.49€) Scar Tissue (1.49€) The Adventures Of Raindance Maggie (1.49€) Rating: PEGI 12 Disponibilité : non disponible au Luxembourg Thèmes (PS3) Jeux Spelunker HD Theme (Retro) (gratuit) Spelunker HD Theme (HD) (gratuit) Abstraits Military (1.49€) Skull (1.49€) Dynamic Blue Flames Theme (1.99€) Animaux Fish (1.49€) Monkey Business (1.99€) Natures Campfire at Night (1.99€) Dynamic Sea Background Theme (1.99€) Dynamic Volcanic Lava Theme (1.99€) Dynamic Waterfalls Theme (1.99€) Lieux Destination: Brooklyn Bridge (1.99€) SF/Heroic fantasy Dynamic Bots Sci-Fi Theme (1.99€) Dynamic Dragon Warrior Theme (1.99€) My Pet Zombie Dynamic Theme (1.99€) Sports CR7 (1.49€) TV/Vidéo Warner Bro’s ‘Horrible Bosses’ Theme Vidéos ( PS3 ) Gatling Gears Launch Trailer Ace Combat Assault Horizon E3 Trailer Assassin’s Creed Revelations Gamescom Trailer Crazy Machines Elements In-game Trailer Wrecked: Revenge Revisited WeaponsTrailer Resistance 3 Resist Trailer Follow Capelli Trailer The Road Trailer
